column5: anyone know how the water levels are right now? is it good for boating and fishing? tried to call them but no answer. looking for a good place for pike/bass not too far from cambridge thats not a river.
The conservation area is closed for the year
The conservation area is closed for the year ah ok, thanks.
At LPRCA parks, you can still walk in after the park is closed. Not sure if they have the same policy. You'd be stuck to shore fishing if it is the same though.
